Did some more quizes... man im such a loser... congratulations. you are the kiss my ass happy bunny. You don't care about anyone or anything. You must be so proud urlLink which happy bunny are you? brought to you by urlLink Quizilla Nihilist Bear urlLink Which Dysfunctional Care Bear Are You? brought to you by urlLink Quizilla Your Heart is Red urlLink What Color is Your Heart? brought to you by urlLink Quizilla You're chocolate. It is alright to open up every once in a while. urlLink Which kind of candy are you? brought to you by urlLink Quizilla avoidant urlLink Which Personality Disorder Do You Have? brought to you by urlLink Quizilla Don't get blood splatters on you when you shoot your victim. Really bored so Im doing some quiz thingys.. What tree am I? Maple, Independence of Mind, No ordinary person, full of imagination and originality, shy and reserved, ambitious, proud, self-respect, hungers for new experiences, sometimes nervous, many complexes, good memory, learns easily, complicated love life, wants to impress How others see you... Others see you as fresh, lively, charming, amusing, and always interesting; someone who is constantly the center of attention, but sufficiently well-balanced not to let it go to your head. They see you also as kind, considerate, and understanding; someone who will cheer them up and help them out. Emotional Aptitude The results of this test indicate that your Emotional Aptitude is very good. You are comfortable with yourself, and generally know how to express yourself and handle stress appropriately. You are creative, motivated, and you deal with change positively. You know yourself well, including your talents and weaknesses. There is, of course, always room for improvement. But you are the kind of person who is progressive and seeks to better yourself anyway. These traits are what help you adapt to change and embrace personal growth. Which Color Are You?... Your color is BLACK, mysterious and successful. Black symbolizes power and achievement. You are strong of character and able to attain your goals undauntedly. Your ambition and polished style exude a sophistication and grace that are unparalleled. These qualities are impressive to all, and intimidating to some. Dont feel like doing anymore so im out. Later Mates

Well its 1:21 and im not tired so figured i write this lil old thing..... anyway got my haircut, went and took senior pictures, and then picked up Vanessa and went to Aaron's B-Day party/party. It was fun Wong and I got Dave's car, and kept look on while 2 others did anna's car later. Played some halo, watched some young Frankestien, and was the spinner/caller on Twister, and after awhile went outside for a walk and then just kinda chilled outside after that. Throwing waterballons at dave/meagen was pretty fun and funny, got closr but didnt get them o well. So anywho im really bored and nobody is on really so just listening to music. Not much else to write so im outtie 5000(I think thats how it goes)

Well just got back from getting my haircut, what a trip that was! According to my haircutter lady ill never have to worry about going bald b/c i have so much hair...lol, thats a good thing i suppose. Anywho waiting to go take my senior pictures and then im off to aarons party, and show off new cut! Was bored so surfed around a but and found im a Birthday Bear - Care Bear, how cool is that? Anywho im done writing so im out. Later Mates! Birthday Bear You are the partier of the bunch! No matter what's going on, you can find a reason to throw a big bash. You're extremely outgoing and love to show others how to have a good time. urlLink Take the Which Care Bear Are You? Quiz!

Really bored right now soooo thought i write in this. Chilled with Jax, Jon, and Dave today, we hung out and went to family fun center that was a good time. Came home about 5 went to McDonalds for supper fun stuff got to drive the talon so whoopie...... had a lot of fun didnt do much tonight listened to music, talked to vanessa and played solitaire for about 2 sec...lol, o well. Prolly gonna watch old school tonight that movie can always make me laugh, and laughing is always good. For some reason slipped into a bad mood tonight which is rather wierd. Have senior pics and have to get my hair cut by the orders of mom = ( i wanted to go all summer but alas it wont come to pass. Not much else going on so Im out, Later Mates.

Had a very seriuos talk with Vanessa tonight, which was different b/c we have n ever acually had a seriuos talk before. I she frustrated because she couldnt talk/see Joann or Jon, so i tried my best to cheer her up. like Ive said i dont like to see her sad, so whenever she tells me she is i try and make her laugh. Anyway I think i helped a little bit so that makes me happy. After that we went back to what we usually talk about which is just goofy stuff, It was a nice talk before and if she ever needs anyone to talk ive told her multiple times she can always come to me. Anywho Im off to listen to my "depressing' music as some would call it. Have a good night all. P.S. Vanessa I do believe you and I wont bring it up again, sorry for being wierd about it, I just have had a ton going on lately

Hung out with Dave and Jon pretty much all day. We played some halo watched a lil bit of old school, went and picked up Ali and katie. I met the creepiest guy ever at this wieird gift shop place on the way to pick up jon's sis, he was very very odd..... I went hippie today no does at all! That was much fun and now i see why Jon did it. Anyway talkin to vanessa right now and shes down cause she doesnt have anyone to talk to, hope she finds someone cause i dont like to see her in bad/sad mood. Today was lots of FUN!!! Later Mates!

Well talked w/ Vanessa over IM, our talk was interesting, I still need to go pick up Matrix from Vanessa but i think it might be better if i wait until tomorrow.. Im not sure she really wants to talk/see me right now. Dont have anything planned for today so gonna finsh up my book only have around 200 pages left to read so a good couple hours and im done. Cheers Mates!

Home now after hangin out w/ aaron and dave last night and spending the night at aaron's house. That was fun i learned how to play a cool new game and bugged his sister this morning. O boy did she look mad when she came upstairs as me and Dave were getting ready to leave, i feel sorry for Aaron cause hes going to have to deal with that. Well just chillin right now in me basement listening to some Fleetwood Mac and reading Harry Potter and The Order of the Phoenix for the 3rd time now. Well thats all i have to say for now. Wish you all a good day! Dawn hope nothing is wrong w/ your kitty.

Well talkin to Tim last I founf out i was right. Its finally good to get the real reason why we broke up. Also i found out she told him what she was goning to do before he left for camp; im not really sursrised at that to tell you the truth just another thing it seems im the last to know about. He said something about everyone not like her if she tells or something, i cant quite remember what he said about it. Im willing to be friends, but its her move now she has to be at least honest with me, she doesnt have to tell me whats going on w/ her, but i would expect the truth from a friend. Well thats all i have for now, i cant wait for my trip to denever so i can see how my uncle, cousin and her baby are doing. P.S. Almost forgot.... Dawn like i said before sorry to hear about you and ryan keep your head up and just spend as much w/ each other as you can

I was in kearny for the day for father's day. I found my uncle Kevin, who rocks, is going to the hospital, and his daughter(my cousin) body is ready to have the baby now however the baby isnt due to till mid aug.... so slight problem there. This week just seems to be getting worse w/ the break up on Monday, dont know what's going on with my friend, and then finding out about my Uncle and cousin today. Im glad tomorrow is monday(did i just say that?) so maybe tomorrow will be the start of a good week. Heres to hoping.. Cheers mates.

Been talking tonight and let me tell you it felt good. I found out a bunch of stuff, and i feel tons better. i thought vanessa cared about me, but i dont think she did... and theres really only 1 reason why you give the its not you its me speech and thats b/c you found another guy/girl you like some im wondering who this mystery person is... i have a hunch though. So that whole im not ready for a long term realtionship was a lie. o well time will tell who this mystery person is.

I never get told the truth, i hear onething from one person and something completely opposite from another. Im always the last one to find crap out too, its sucks. Theres only a few people who are honest w/ me and thats aaron,, dave, jon for the most part, jax sometimes. Like tonight i found several things which Ive been told something completely different beforehand. First the thing with Jax, and then the thing with Vanessa. Im pretty sure i know why we broke no matter what she says ive heard it from several people now. I don't think she ever liked me..... and would explain WHY she never tells me anything, why she seems to be taking the whole situation much better than me, and also why shes able to move on so fast like last night and holding hands with someone during dodgeball.... thats how it started with me and her... I have only been honest with her from the start... so much for the "not ready for a long term relationship" she just didnt want to be with me I just wish people would quit lying to me! I can handle the truth lies only make things worse! ARG!!! It seems like Im the only person who acually cares about other people feelings and not just themselves sometimes. My rant is done for the night, later all. P.S. I know this is prolly gonna upset some people. Sorry if I did, just speaking what I feel. If im wrong let me know and enlighten me = )
Found a saying a couple of days ago that i really like thought i share with you all. "Sometimes you just have to take the leap, and build your wings on the way down."

Last night i went over to Luiz's house for his surprise Birthday/ Going away party. I thought i was starting to get over the whole thing with Vanessa but I'm not close at all. I went to go pick her up and as soon as I got there all of these memories and feelings came rushing back, it sucked big time. I wish things were diffrent like us still being together or getting back together, but i know she doesnt want that, so i don't want to think about its just hard not to. Even though she says it had nothing to do with me I still think I did something, o well. I'm all torn up inside, i cared about her sooo much and what hurts the most is she didnt feel the sameway at all. I wish i could just flip a switch and be over with it. I would never do anything she didnt want to or anything that hurt her. Life is just so hard sometimes it seems. After watching dodgeball i put on my happy face, even though i felt worse than before. The song im listening ALOT lately is Smile Empty Soul's "With This Knife", its just what happened to me, and what i have to do. I need to get rid of the love i have for Vanessa and go back to being friends. I know we only dated for a month, but everything just felt so right. Im not sure what love is or feels like but she rocked my world, so i dont know if thats close or not but i did and still do care about her a ton.

pretty bored so doin these.. Category X - The Changeling Witty, amusing and a bit weird, you're welcomed into most social groups, even though you don't 'fit in' perfectly . OOO and thanks Dawn for tellin me how to do Ü!

Its been a couple of days since I posted last soooo, ill catch all of you up that read this thing! lol... Anyway been pretty down about my grandpa this week, my mom went to Kearny since he wasn't doing very well, and he decided to get the surgery after all so now he has only 1/2 of one of his feet. Lets see sent the night at Jaxxie's house several times and just chilled with him. The Ders came into town so Jono hasn't been able to do anything so pretty much just been chilling at my house for the most part. Thommys B-day was on Thur so went out to Red Robin and tonight he's havin some friends spend the night. Yesterday was Vanessa's B-day party that was pretty fun, I didn't realize how much fun Jess was since I've never really talked to hear, but I must say she is pretty cool and she makes me laugh. Me and Ali totally dominated in the 80s question and scavenger hunt Us-45 them 22 and 24(I think). I guess me and Jon are a lot like according to Ali and Jess.....I almost got in trouble last night but my parents are all bark and no bite about that kind of stuff so nothing happened would put the cool smiley thing Dawn does but don't now the Alt+Nums for it so = ) will work. Anyway stayed up till 5 this morning and woke up at 9. Don't have much going on today. Later Mates

Well just got cleaned up from having a huge water/shaving vream fight with the neighbors and it was sweet!! I had a blast and now i smell like shaving cream, how hot is that? Anyway waiting for my turn to take a shower so i dont smell like shaving cream anymore...lol. Later Mates O yeah we got a name for the new kitty... Oreo! Shes awesome!

MY FAMILY GOT A KITTY!!! IM SO HAPPY RIGHT NOW! lol anyway the new kitty is awesome and i love it already. Shes black and white and we still need to come up w/ a new for her. So far we have Rose, Jasmine, Whiskers, and Azul. I really like jasmine and rose so we'll see what we decide for her. Anyway shes a sweetie and very playful and all around awesome. This totally made my day!

Well got back from kearny last night and right now im super bored and want to do something before the lock in but everyone is busy or doesnt want to hang out. Just want to get my mind off stuff but guess ill have to manage. anyway took Donnie Darko and NCAA 2005 back today stopped by vanessa's house and wished her luck at her comp, and thats been my day. Almost forgot had a funny talk w/ Dawn, she cracks me up, anyway later mates

Well dropped off Dave's CD this morning after walking up at noon b/c i stayed up til 8 this morning. Anyway after that went to Vanessa's house and watched 50 first dates and then Ghost. Had an interesting time to say the least and need to find out what it all means. so ill catch you later mates!

Whoa somethings up cause vanessa acually told me something when i asked her... i think the would may be coming to an end..... watch out. Just kidding but she usually doesnt tell me anything... not sure why dont know if she doesnt trust me or what, o well just trying to help. later mates

LAYER ONE: On The Outside -- Name: Mike -- Birthdate: 10-8-86 -- Birthplace: kearny -- Current Location: omaha -- Eye Color: dark brown -- Hair Color: Black and curly -- Height: 5'5? -- Righty or Lefty: Right all the way -- Zodiac Sign: Libra LAYER TWO: On The Inside -- Your heritage: Hispanic on me Moms side, German on me Dads side -- The shoes you wore today: My Nikes -- Your weakness: Self-Confidence i guess -- Your fears: Needles, dont like them one bit -- Your perfect pizza: Pepperoni with lots of Cheese! -- Goal you'd like to achieve: Good job, married, kids LAYER THREE: Yesterday, Today, Tomorrow -- Your most overused phrase on AIM: lol --Your thoughts first waking up: The wierd dream i had -- Your best physical feature: ummm no idea -- Your bedtime: Whenever im tired -- Your most missed memory: Having no worries LAYER FOUR: Your Pick -- Pepsi or Coke: Coke, i like the burnin feeling -- McDonalds or Burger King: Burger King, thier fries rock -- Single or group dates: Either works but i like single better -- Adidas or Nike: Nikes w/o a doubt -- Lipton Ice Tea or Nestea: Dont care -- Chocolate or vanilla: Vanilla w/ frozen Strawberries YUM -- Cappuccino or coffee: neither, yuck LAYER FIVE: Do You? -- Smoke: nope -- Cuss: try not to, but i do sometimes -- Have a crush(es): i do, but dont see her a lot so nothin will prolly happen -- Do you think you've been in love: prolly not -- Want to go to college: sure do -- Like high school: Its sooo much fun and sooo easy -- Want to get married: yes, hopefully once -- Believe in yourself: once in a blue moon -- Get motion sickness: nope -- Think you're a health freak: lol, not even close -- Get along with your parents: yes -- Like thunderstorms: For sure! I like it to pour and thunder and all that fun stuff -- Play an instrument: nope LAYER SIX: In the past month... -- Drank alcohol: gross no -- Smoked: never -- Done a drug: never -- Made Out: nope -- Gone on a date: no -- Gone to the mall: several times -- Eaten an entire box of Oreos: nope -- Eaten sushi: not i -- Been on stage: nope -- Been dumped: yes, that sucked big time -- Gone skating: nopers -- Made homemade cookies: nooo -- Gone skinny dipping: nope -- Dyed your hair: no -- Stolen anything: nope LAYER SEVEN: Ever.. -- Been trashed or extremely intoxicated: dont do that crap -- Been caught "doing something": nope -- Been called a tease: nope -- Gotten beaten up: nope -- Shoplifted: yes LAYER EIGHT: Getting Older -- Age you hope to be married: early 20s -- Numbers and Names of Children: 2, Jasmine for girl dont know for boy -- How do you want to die: a freak accident would be cool -- What do you want to be when you grow up: not sure a lot of things -- What country would you most like to visit: France LAYER NINE: In a partner -- Best eye color?: ummm dark i guess -- Best hair color?: Black or brown w/ some curls -- Short or long hair: long i dont like short hair on girls -- Height: shorter -- Best articles of clothing: whatever she looks good in -- Best first date location: Movies are always fun LAYER TEN: In The Numbers... -- Number of drugs taken illegally: 0 -- Number of people I could trust with my life: ummm not sure -- Number of CDs that I own: a ton -- Number of piercings: 0 -- Number of tattoos: 0 -- Number of times my name has appeared in the news paper: maybe once -- Number of things in my past that I regret: a lot I dont think Vanessa knew what i was talking about when i asked what the stupid she did was, or she didnt want to say i was talkin about the thing she wrote a couple of days ago in her xanga.... o well

LOVING ONE. You need safety in your relationship. You want to be sure in his/her arms, knowing that he will protect you and you can be totally devoted to your other. At this point you are very vulnerable. You open yourself and dont even think that he/she could cheat you. You totally trust your partner in every single way. SO if you find out that she/he lied to you or played a game this trust is broken. You may try to forgive your other but this will be very difficult.He/She has to be friendly and trustworthy. PLEASE VOTE, I want to know what you think about my quiz, I worked hard on it. You can always message me or tell me how I can improve that quiz. Ill sure write back. urlLink ~THE big LOVE TEST!! What do you need? With PICS! For girls and boys!~ brought to you by urlLink Quizilla the trust thing is really true, i hate it when people are dishonest with me.

Well helped out at the Fremont days yesterday w/ Dave, Amber and Vanessa. I gotta clean out glasses ooo how much fun that was. Rodeo was cool to see but my neck was bothering me for the whole thing mostly, vanessa made it feel better for a while, but it started up again later. There was the dance thingy and all they played was country music = ( i dont like country music at all. Thing we went to the downtown stage to see the band that was playing there but they were done when we got there. I got a palm reading that was fun. She said Im honest with everyone but others arent honest with me(strange i think that a lot) and that people talk behind my back a lot but i should ignore them. She said im very smart but i need to study more(which i never do), That i should listen to what my family says they dont want anything bad to happen to me. Im going to be a father early and get married whne im 19, andhave 2 kids a boy and a girl. Ill be married once to my soulmate and im suppose to meet her in a year. Shes going to a rich girl and im going to make good money and have my own bussiness and house, how cool is that? Spent the night at Jons house with Dann, vanessa kept calling and could have gotten Jon in a good amount of trouble if she had woken up his parents when she called his house. After i hung up on her for the 3rd time we lwft jons went to my house and picked up some stuff and then we went to Hy-Vee and bought 5 12 packs of pop and then went back to jons house and cooked pizza and watched "The Butterfly Effect". Well thats all for now Later Mates!

Howdy all! got back from Denver a little before midnight last night... whoopie! I got the movie "The Butterfly Effect" on DVD while we were in Kearny yesterday; that movie is sooooo bomb you havent seen it you need to. Taled to Dave and he spent the night and right now hes off teachin little kiddos how to swim. Well today i can finish getting the 10 hours of community service i need for NHS, cause im pretty sure im going to Fremont days and helping out for a couple of hours. I really hope i make it into NHS cause that will REALLY help with college. I should have a better chance this year to get in than last year since im in some after school activities now so yay! Well thats all i have for now, Later Mates

Well tomorrow I leave for Denver to go see my aunt, uncle, and cousin, and I wont be back until went night. Well saw Spider-Man 2 the other day and they movie is AWESOME! Much better than the first one, if you haven't seen it go...now. Yesterday was tons of fun... went to Linomha beach with Jax, Jon, and Dave. Meet a couple of girls there who were pretty cool, and I feel off the mountain! Go me! That place is a lot of fun and I want to go back again sometime cause it rocks! After that spent the night at Jax's w/ Dave, and Jon and we met up with some of Jax's other friends and watched Badder Santa which is a hilarious movie... any who that's all I got for now and I still need to finish packing for Denver! Later Mates!

Came back from Kearny today and went to the block party. Jenny had a party afterwards and that was fun. Didnt get to carried away kept myself under control and had a good time. Ummm not much else to right besides the 2 parties tonight.. ummm gotta wake up at 3 this morning to watch my lil bros, and i believe thats it. Later Mates!

Hmm pretty normal day...Aaron cme back into town and had him and Dann over and we watched Eurotrip.. thats a funny movie. Parentals left for dinner at the babysitters and I made hamburgers for me and Thommy for supper. It was raining like crazy outside and i loved it! Vanessa acually asked me to stop by...that happens once in a blue moon...talked to her for a bit on my way home from jon's house. Returned his socks and went to pick up my hat but couldnt find it..o well get it next time. Guess Jon and Vanessa kiss and made up so thats good to hear.... not much else going on besides that have reg tomorrow at 1... gonna meet up w/ jax there so that'll be fun. Later mates Ü

I just had the funniest converssation in AIM w/ Sawny Ü...lol that i have ever had ever. im soo mad i was gonna save it cause i didnt stop laughing the whole time! im hella pissed! o well Dawny is such a hoot.... or should i say jilarious? lol anyway that was the coolest talk ever...lol. later mates
